9. subtool > geometry > modify topology > del hidden
    Alt + move brush will move it towards the normal direction

Dynamesh for setting up default shape before retopo, and can use and blend IMM brushes,
Harder to move if too many polygon

Subdiv could be done after retopo, can use IMM brushes,
Easier to move at lower subdiv
